context_bundle.summary: Protocol Buffers for efficient serialization with proto3 syntax, gRPC services, buf for linting, and code generation

onboarding.quick_start: brew install protobuf buf && protoc --version && buf --version
common_patterns: Proto3 message: 'syntax = "proto3"; message User { string id = 1; string name = 2; int32 age = 3; }'
Nested: 'message User { message Address { string street = 1; string city = 2; } Address address = 4; }'
Repeated: 'message Users { repeated User users = 1; } // array of users'
gRPC service: 'service UserService { rpc GetUser(GetUserRequest) returns (User); rpc ListUsers(ListUsersRequest) returns (stream User); }'
Oneof: 'message Result { oneof result { User user = 1; Error error = 2; } }'
Buf lint: 'buf lint to check proto files against style guide'
known_errors: field number conflict: Ensure unique field numbers, never reuse deleted numbers
breaking change: Use buf breaking to detect, follow compatibility rules
import not found: Check import paths, use buf.yaml for dependencies
code generation failed: Install language plugins, check protoc version
enum zero value: Always define _UNSPECIFIED = 0 for enums
oneof not working: Check field numbers unique within oneof
